title: Handle a Client Billing Inquiry
description: A client has a question about a specific line item on their invoice. A billing coordinator needs to provide an explanation.

tasks.description: Retrieve the specific invoice and the time entry for the line item in question.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent locates the exact time entry the client is asking about.

tasks.description: Review the detailed description of the work performed for that time entry.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent understands what work the charge corresponds to.

tasks.description: Provide a clear and detailed explanation to the client about the work that was done.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully resolves the client's inquiry.
